description:
While Futaba is away for a memorial at her country home, Hikari befriends a girl by the sea and puts into motion a plan to make a summer staple more exciting for everyone in the Diving Club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu no Mannaka to Kirakira no Hitomi no Koto
The Story of Midsummer and the Sparkling Eyes
夏の真ん中とキラキラの瞳のコト
